title: [HOLD for payment 2023-09-20] [$1000] Web - Profile - No back button on personal details offline mode
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Open the app
2. If logged in then logout
3. Login and switch off internet connection
4. Visit settings->profile->personal details and observe that page does not have back button while loading

Expected result: App should display back button on personal details page while loading on offline mode

Actual result: None
